Text: Thanks. Work's fine, but today while trying to update virus definitions i recived error message, something about "wrong signature" and no more updates
The .dll supplied is detected to be a trojan dropper and now no longer updates, suspicous....................
update in a week thaS SAD :( AND EVERYTIME IT shows i required a registration :(
U have 2 stop the file system shield from scanning DLL files on exec start up. If u do that it will carry on updating with no problem.

to:bigmanmark 
how to do that
PLEASE TELL ME!!!!!!
go on avast real time settings then expert settings then on the top option theres a tick box with scan library's when starting untick that box
